L

Log - Class in Server
A log file writer.
Log(boolean) - Constructor for class Server.Log
Constructs a Log instance, sets up the file named by the date or server.log if appending
Log() - Constructor for class Server.Log
Constructs a Log instance, sets up the file named by the date.
log - Variable in class Server.Server
The instance of the log file writer.
LOG_OFF - Static variable in class shared.Request
static field to be passed into the constructor of a new Request.
Login - Class in Client
A Login GUI that connects to the server.
Login() - Constructor for class Client.Login
Creates elements and adds them to this instance of Login, sets up ActionListeners to this instance.
logoff() - Method in class Client.Comms
Sends Log off to the server to finish the session, then close the socket.
logon(String) - Method in class Client.Comms
Log on to the server and get back the users reservations.
